name: AssemblyVersionLoader
description: Loads an assembly version from the DLL file using reflection and makes them available as build variables.
author: Ash Stansfield

inputs.name: sourceFileName
inputs.label: Source assembly file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Assembly file to load and read version.

inputs.name: variablesPrefix
inputs.label: Variables Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Each variable generated will be prefixed with this value. For example: 'MyPrefix.' results in: #(MyPrefix.AssemblyInfo.Version)
